text: Manuhe tomaka anaphala (yud'dhalabdha sampada) samparke prasna karae; koraa, ‘yud'dhalabdha sampada allaha arau raachulara babe; eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau nijara majata sadbhara sthapana karaa lagate allaha arau te'omra raachulara anugatya karaa, yadi tomaloke mumina horaa’
